name: Mosaic Mini Golf
summary:
Welcome to Mosaic Mini Golf!
Come relax and tackle the golf ball in all kind of pastel environments: lush forest, theme park, underwater, above the clouds.. A golf ball inside a pinball machine? Sure why not. All of this happens under the watchful eyes of the island natives.
And in the end find yourself on a sun-drenched beach who might just reveal its secret...
Unique multi player split screen action! The more the merrier: bring in friends and play with two people at the same time on the same iPad! Who will score the most points?
Beat your own records, and also those of other people on the Game Center leaderboards. It is said that you can complete the whole course in less than 70 ball hits...
